restrictions module

restrictions.collided_obstacle(current_node, neighbor_node, state_grid, part_id)[source]

Checks if the path from current_node to neighbor_node obstructs any obstacles or transitions.

Return type

bool

restrictions.goal_restricted(part_id, pos, direction, goal_dict)[source]

Checks if the direction restriction of the goal is violated.

Return type

bool

restrictions.neighbor_restricted(current_node, neighbor_node, pos, current_state_grid, part_id)[source]

Contains restriction set that checks if neighbor is restricted. :param _sphinx_paramlinks_restrictions.neighbor_restricted.part_id:

Return type

bool

restrictions.out_of_bounds(neighbor_node, state_grid)[source]

Checks if neighbor is outside of the boundaries of the state grid.

restrictions.restrict_neighbor_pos(directions, goal_dict, current_pos, pipe_stock, predecessors, fast_mode, key, start_pos, transition_points)[source]

Determines what neighbors are reachable from the current position and with the available parts. Removes neighbors that violate goal restrictions.

Return type

set
